General.Name: Viridis Holdings Corp
General.Description: Viridis Holdings Corp. does not have significant operations. It intends to the process of seeking and reviewing opportunities to acquire significant assets in an alternative business that will meet the qualifying transaction. The company was formerly known as Viridis Energy Inc. and changed its name to Viridis Holdings Corp. in August 2018. Viridis Holdings Corp. was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.

0.Name: Mr. Rajwant S. Kang C.M.A., CPA, CMA
0.Title: CFO & Company Sec.
